name: CYBER-DINU-MD
description: This is a simple WhatsApp bot built with Node.js to make your WhatsApp enjoyable

PREFIX.description: Choose your prefix for Keith. To prevent errors and confusion, you must set a prefix

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put any phone numbers you want to be bot owner without + or spaces, separated by commas. Ex: 94753262213, 94753262213

OWNER_NAME.description: Add your owner name for the bot

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Add your HEROKU API key here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Should match to your app name. Copy-paste it here for the HEROKU vars setting

session.description: Paste the session ID that you received in WhatsApp after linking the bot. It's used for authentication.

AUTOVIEW_STATUS.description: Type true if you want the bot to automatically read all status updates

events.description: Choose whether to allow the bot to detect events in groups such as promote, demote, remove, and add. If set to true, the bot will send welcome/goodbye messages and signal when somebody is promoted or demoted.

AUTOBIO.description: Type true if you want the bot to autoupdate its bio constantly

ANTICALL_MSG.description: Add your anticall message. This works when anticall is enabled

ANTICALL.description: Type true if you want the bot to reject unnecessary calls

GROUP_CONTROL.description: Type true if you want the bot to kick those who send links or bad words in the group.

URL.description: Add your image URL for the bot

AUTOLIKE_STATUS.description: Type true if you want the bot to automatically like status updates, this will only work if AUTOVIEW_STATUS is true.

AUTOREAD.description: Put here true if you want the bot to automatically bluetick messages in private.

WA_PRESENCE.description: This is your WhatsApp Presence Status: Here's how to set it up: Type *typing* if you want the bot to show typing..., Type *recording* if you want the bot to show recording..., Type *online* if you want the bot to be always online, Leave this field blank if you want the bot to show your actual presence.

MODE.description: Type private if you don't want other people to use the bot or public if you want everyone to access.
